title: How Many Episodes of Will Trent Season 3 Are Left?
description: Will Trent Season 3 airs Tuesdays with plenty of episodes still to come! Don’t miss a moment of the thrilling drama on ABC and Hulu. The post How Many Episodes of Will Trent Season 3 Are Left? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Fans of this iconic cop-drama show Will Trent Season 3 wants to explore how many episodes it has along with its exact release schedule.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about how many episodes are in Season 3 of Will Trent? This police procedural drama follows Special Agent Will Trent, who overcame a tough upbringing in Atlanta’s foster care system. With the highest clearance rate, he’s determined to prevent others from experiencing similar pain. Fans are eager to learn more about the cast, remaining episodes, and release timeline. Here’s the latest news on Will Trent Season 3’s episode count and release schedule How many episodes of Will Trent Season 3 are left after Episode 1? Will Trent Season 3 features a total of 18 episodes. So far, Episode 1 has aired, leaving 17 more to go. The season officially premiered on January 7, 2025, and is already making waves on ABC and Hulu. So far, only the first episode has aired, offering fans an extended adventure in the Will Trent universe. New episodes are released every Tuesday at 8 p.m. ET on ABC, with streaming available on Hulu the following day. Check out the confirmed release schedule for the first few episodes below: Episode 1: “I’m a Guest Here” – Aired on January 7, 2025 Episode 2: “Sunny-Side Up” – Airs on January 14, 2025 Episode 3: “You’re the One I Want Watching My Back” – Airs on January 21, 2025 Episode 4: TBA – Airs on January 28, 2025 Further episodes may be subject to breaks, so stay tuned for updates. Who stars in Will Trent Season 3? Season 3 reunites fans with their favorite cast members. Ramón Rodríguez reprises his role as the titular character, while Erika Christensen, Iantha Richardson, Jake McLaughlin, Sonja Sohn, and Gina Rodriguez return to round out the stellar ensemble. The beloved series dives deeper into the compelling journey of Special Agent Will Trent. After a six-month hiatus due to the arrest of his girlfriend, Angie Polaski, he returns to the Georgia Bureau of Investigations. However, reintegrating into the team proves more challenging than expected, especially with the arrival of a new prosecutor, Marion, who complicates matters further. Adapted from Karin Slaughter’s novels, the show masterfully blends emotional resonance with intense investigative drama. Catch up on all the episodes of Will Trent Seasons 1–3, streaming now on ABC and Hulu.
html:
Curious about how many episodes are in Season 3 of Will Trent? This police procedural drama follows Special Agent Will Trent, who overcame a tough upbringing in Atlanta’s foster care system. With the highest clearance rate, he’s determined to prevent others from experiencing similar pain. Fans are eager to learn more about the cast, remaining episodes, and release timeline.

Here’s the latest news on Will Trent Season 3’s episode count and release schedule

How many episodes of Will Trent Season 3 are left after Episode 1?

Will Trent Season 3 features a total of 18 episodes. So far, Episode 1 has aired, leaving 17 more to go.

The season officially premiered on January 7, 2025, and is already making waves on ABC and Hulu. So far, only the first episode has aired, offering fans an extended adventure in the Will Trent universe. New episodes are released every Tuesday at 8 p.m. ET on ABC, with streaming available on Hulu the following day.

Check out the confirmed release schedule for the first few episodes below:

  • Episode 1: “I’m a Guest Here” – Aired on January 7, 2025
  • Episode 2: “Sunny-Side Up” – Airs on January 14, 2025
  • Episode 3: “You’re the One I Want Watching My Back” – Airs on January 21, 2025
  • Episode 4: TBA – Airs on January 28, 2025

Further episodes may be subject to breaks, so stay tuned for updates.

Who stars in Will Trent Season 3?

Season 3 reunites fans with their favorite cast members. Ramón Rodríguez reprises his role as the titular character, while Erika Christensen, Iantha Richardson, Jake McLaughlin, Sonja Sohn, and Gina Rodriguez return to round out the stellar ensemble.

The beloved series dives deeper into the compelling journey of Special Agent Will Trent. After a six-month hiatus due to the arrest of his girlfriend, Angie Polaski, he returns to the Georgia Bureau of Investigations. However, reintegrating into the team proves more challenging than expected, especially with the arrival of a new prosecutor, Marion, who complicates matters further.

Adapted from Karin Slaughter’s novels, the show masterfully blends emotional resonance with intense investigative drama.

Catch up on all the episodes of Will Trent Seasons 1–3, streaming now on ABC and Hulu.
